info.name: Walkout Backend API
info.description: Complete API collection for Walkout Backend with authentication and CRUD operations

request.description: Register a new user. User will be created with isActive=false and needs admin approval.

exec: // Save in both environment and collection variables

request.description: Login with admin credentials. Only active users can login. Token will be saved automatically.
Login as regular user. User must be activated by admin first.
Get all users. Requires admin or superAdmin role.
Get user details by ID. Requires authentication.
Activate a user account. Requires admin or superAdmin role.
Deactivate a user account. Requires admin or superAdmin role.
Change user role. Only superAdmin can perform this action. Valid roles: superAdmin, admin, user, office
Update extra permissions for a user. Only superAdmin can perform this action.
Update user details. Requires admin or superAdmin role.
Delete a user. Requires admin or superAdmin role.
Update own profile. Any authenticated user can update their name, email, and password.
Create a new region. Requires admin or superAdmin role.
Get all regions. Requires authentication.
Get region by ID. Requires authentication.
Update region details. Requires admin or superAdmin role.
Delete a region. Requires admin or superAdmin role.
Create a new office. Requires admin or superAdmin role. Must have a valid region_id.
Get all offices with region details populated. Requires authentication.
Get office by ID with region details. Requires authentication.
Update office details. Requires admin or superAdmin role.
Delete an office. Requires admin or superAdmin role.
Create a new team with permissions. Requires admin or superAdmin role.
Get all teams. Requires authentication.
Get team by ID. Requires authentication.
Update team details and permissions. Requires admin or superAdmin role.
Delete a team. Requires admin or superAdmin role.
Manually trigger appointment sync for all active offices. Admin/SuperAdmin only.
Get sync history for last 30 days or specific date. Admin/SuperAdmin only.
Get appointment statistics including total count, breakdown by office, and last sync details. Admin/SuperAdmin only.
Get appointments for a specific office with pagination. Admin/SuperAdmin only.
Manually trigger provider schedule sync from Google Sheet. Admin/SuperAdmin only.
Get provider schedule statistics including total records, breakdown by office, and by provider type. Admin/SuperAdmin only.
Get provider schedule list with optional filters. All authenticated users.

item.name: Get Provider Schedule by Office and DOS

request.description: Get all provider schedules for a specific office and date of service. All authenticated users.
Create a new button set. Admin/SuperAdmin only.
Get all button sets. Public endpoint - no authentication required.
Get button set by ID. All authenticated users.
Update button set. Admin/SuperAdmin only.
Delete button set. Admin/SuperAdmin only. Cannot delete if buttons exist.
Create a new radio button. Admin/SuperAdmin only.
Get all radio buttons with optional filters. All authenticated users.

item.name: Get Radio Buttons by Button Set

request.description: Get all radio buttons for a specific button set. All authenticated users.
Get radio button by ID. All authenticated users.
Update radio button. Admin/SuperAdmin only.
Delete radio button. Admin/SuperAdmin only.
Create multiple radio buttons at once. Admin/SuperAdmin only.
Update multiple radio buttons at once. Admin/SuperAdmin only.
Delete multiple radio buttons at once. Admin/SuperAdmin only.
Get all archived button sets with filters. SuperAdmin only. Use deletedBy filter to find items deleted by specific user.

item.name: Get Archived Button Set by ID

request.description: Get specific archived button set details. SuperAdmin only.
Restore full button set. Provide newName if original name conflicts. SuperAdmin only.
Restore individual button. If parent set exists, button is added back. If parent deleted, new set is created. SuperAdmin only.
Permanently delete from archive. Cannot be undone. SuperAdmin only.
Add references to usedIn array. Tracks where this button set is being used. Admin/SuperAdmin only.
Remove references from usedIn array. Admin/SuperAdmin only.
Replace entire usedIn array with new references. Use empty array [] to clear all. Admin/SuperAdmin only.
Create a new dropdown set. Admin/SuperAdmin only.
Get all dropdown sets. Public endpoint - no authentication required.
Get dropdown set by ID with populated options. All authenticated users.
Update dropdown set. Admin/SuperAdmin only.
Delete dropdown set. Admin/SuperAdmin only. Options remain intact.
Add options to dropdown set. Admin/SuperAdmin only.
Remove options from dropdown set. Admin/SuperAdmin only. Does not delete options.
Create a new dropdown option. Admin/SuperAdmin only.
Get all dropdown options with optional filters. All authenticated users.
Get dropdown option by ID. All authenticated users.
Update dropdown option. Admin/SuperAdmin only.
Delete dropdown option. Admin/SuperAdmin only. Automatically removes from all dropdown sets.
Create multiple dropdown options at once. Admin/SuperAdmin only.
Update multiple dropdown options at once. Admin/SuperAdmin only.
Delete multiple dropdown options at once. Admin/SuperAdmin only. Automatically removes from all dropdown sets.
Get all archived dropdown sets with filters. SuperAdmin only. Use deletedBy filter to find items deleted by specific user.

item.name: Get Archived Dropdown Set by ID

request.description: Get specific archived dropdown set details. SuperAdmin only.
Restore full dropdown set. Provide newName if original name conflicts. SuperAdmin only.
Restore individual option. If parent set exists, option is added back. If parent deleted, new set is created. SuperAdmin only.
Permanently delete from archive. Cannot be undone. SuperAdmin only.
Add references to usedIn array. Tracks where this dropdown set is being used. Admin/SuperAdmin only.
Remove references from usedIn array. Admin/SuperAdmin only.
Replace entire usedIn array with new references. Use empty array [] to clear all. Admin/SuperAdmin only.

request.description: Submit office section of walkout form. All authenticated users.
Get all walkouts with optional filters. All authenticated users.
Get walkout details by ID. All authenticated users.

request.description: Update office section. Note: submitToLC3 timestamp will NOT be updated. All authenticated users.
Soft delete walkout. Admin/SuperAdmin only.
